verses.roman:
āgraha kariyā tāṅre vasi' khāoyāila
āpane āgraha kari' pariveśana kaila

synonyms: āgraha kariyā—with great eagerness; tāṅre vasi'-seating him; khāoyāila—he fed; āpane—personally; āgraha kari'-with great eagerness; pariveśana kaila -administered the prasāda.
translation: With great eagerness Rāmacandra Purī seated Jagadānanda Paṇḍita and personally served him prasāda.
